conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion criteria are met.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness. Interior volume is clear. Viewing angle is appropriate. Clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and adjacencies are mostly correct, though some wall curves are simplified. Wall positions align well. Doors and windows are omitted. Missing a small exterior patio in the front.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture, kitchen, and bathroom fixtures are present, correctly placed, and scaled reasonably within their rooms. Orientation is logical.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. Interior is bright and clear, with good lighting. Consistent material and clean presentation.

detected_errors.description: Doors and windows are missing from the 3D render, replaced by solid walls or mere cutouts without actual door/window frames.
A small exterior patio/porch area on the front of the house in the 2D plan is entirely missing from the 3D model.
The curved walls in the 2D plan, especially in the central area, are rendered as straight segments in the 3D model, simplifying the original geometry.

summary: The 3D transformation is generally good with accurate layout and furnishings, but it suffers from a lack of doors and windows, and some simplification of original curved wall geometry.
